pullRequest.title: Warn user if moving objects between admin units

commit.message: Warn user if moving objects between admin collections

nodes.bodyText: I think you'll need to check every object being move to see if it is moving to a different admin unit. You can have objects from multiple admin units in the same search result, in which case we'd particularly want to be able to warn users. If objects are coming from multiple admin units, maybe we can just say "from multiple admin units" rather than showing a title
I might be missing something, but i think there's an extra space being added before the prompt in this case
I think this would throw an error if the objectPath didn't have a length > 1 since it returns undefined. I think this could occur if you were moving a collection to a different unit

I haven't verified this, but I am guessing that if you move two items from the same admin unit to a different admin unit, this will result in an adminUnitsSize of 2? Which could be a bit confusing to users, particularly if they are moving a lot more items.
Should add a test to verify this use case.

commit.message: Fix incorrect current admin unit when moving items between admin units
Fix issue with message when moving a collection to a different admin unit
